text.section: The Board shall administer and enforce this title.

The Board may issue a subpoena for the attendance of a witness to testify or the production of evidence in connection with:
any disciplinary action under § 15-317 of this title; or
any proceeding brought for an alleged violation of this title.

section.section: The Board may sue to enforce any provision of this title by injunction.

In seeking an injunction under this subsection, the Board is not required to:
post bond; or
allege or prove either that:
an adequate remedy at law does not exist; or
substantial or irreparable damage would result from the continued violation of the provision.
A member of the Board may not be held personally liable for any action taken under this subsection in good faith and with reasonable grounds.
